0.wording: Blue made me remeber our swimming pool. Be aware you're welcome to join our pool.

1.wording: Red is the colour of Blood Donation. NHS will be happy if you join the donators team.

2.wording: Yellow it the colour of gold. We have some financial short courses, if you're interested.

3.wording: It's impressive how black clothes fit any situation.

4.wording: Perhapes you like the British weather, normally grey.

5.wording: Nature, nature. Green is the nature colour. Why not join our Green movement society?!
